review: I bought this as a gift because there are few electronics that run Sling TV (live TV streaming app). Apple TV does not, though iOS does. Chromecast does not support it as far as I know. Fire TV Stick supports it and every other major entertainment app. It works way smoother than any other TV streaming device I've ever used including Apple TV and Chromecast. I love it.
